content: this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product crochet easter egg bunny pattern amigurumi spring decoration the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english this pattern is available for online viewing on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/bunny-egg-crochet-pattern/
